name: Another Day (Klebeer)
description:
In "Another Day" Tristan thinks about his life and where it is going, while he remembers the events of his past. All the changes he went through, people that he met, and the events that happened. Solve the puzzles to keep going further on tristan's memories.

This is a work in progress and will have changes in future releases, graphics and audio will be improved, and the story and dialogues will be polished.

This version contains only the first part of the game.

Play on your browser or download the windows version to avoid the loading screens.

Production progress:

Story: 85%

Graphics: 60%

Music/Audio: 40%

Code: 35%

Release date

TBA (It might take a while as I am doing everything by myself :)
